description: Represents a collaboration between AWS accounts that allows for secure data collaboration

CollaborationQueryLogStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowCleartext.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowDuplicates.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowJoinsOnColumnsWithDifferentNames.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

PreserveNulls.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

DataEncryptionMetadata.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MemberAbility.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CAN_QUERY | CAN_RECEIVE_RESULTS  
Update requires: No interruption

MemberAbilities.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AccountId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^\d+$  
Update requires: No interruption

MemberSpecification.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MemberStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: INVITED | ACTIVE | LEFT | REMOVED  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^(?!\s*$)[\u0020-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFFD\uD800\uDBFF-\uDC00\uDFFF\t]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms collaboration.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms collaboration.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^(?!\s*$)[\u0020-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFFD\uD800\uDBFF-\uDC00\uDFFF\t\r\n]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Members.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^(?!\s*$)[\u0020-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFFD\uD800\uDBFF-\uDC00\uDFFF\t]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 100  
Update requires: No interruption

CollaborationIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption
